header.title: phpBB3 Form Mod
header.description: Create forms to collect data from you members in any forum (one form per forum)
header.author-notes:
Most of the credit for this mod goes to Sajaki @ www.bbdkp.com for his Appform Mod... The original Kiss Portal Form Maker mod was rewritten to encompass the Appform code, albeit alter and extended...
This mod allows admin to create a form for any given forum. The form is used to collect data from members in a controller manner.
When posting a new post the user has the option to enter information in form mode... The form is only available when posting the first post, all other posts (replies) are treated as normal... The mod is ideal for forums dealing with reviews, bug reports etc...
Validation of form data relies on HTML5 (client side validation) and is supported in Firefox, Opera, Chrome, IE 10 and other browsers (Safari does not currently support HTML5 form validation)... If the forms are used to collect crucial data, you may wish to add your own javascript validation code....
Please note we do not use conformation for every action in the ACP... This speeds up management substantially... (feels like Ajax ;)
